summary: Production management app with order ingestion, master design management, and dashboard with multiple tabs
architectural_notes: App has multiple tabs in dashboard for viewing orders
Master Design page contains Karigar list for dropdown selection
Design column in rows triggers image popup instead of row selection
Excel upload functionality for order ingestion and master data
known_issues: Row selection not working across tabs (design column excluded)
Sidebar not visible at 100% zoom on iPhone and overlaps content at 50% zoom
Ingest orders failing after excel upload
Upload and save operations are slow
JPEG/PDF export not working on iPhone browser

existing_features.title: Fix row selection highlighting across all dashboard tabs (Total Orders, Ready, Hallmark, Customer Orders, Karigars). Clicking anywhere on a row except the design column should select/highlight the row. Clicking on the design column should continue to show the design image popup without selecting the row.

Fix sidebar display on iPhone browser at 100% zoom level so the entire sidebar is visible. Prevent sidebar from overlapping page content at 50% zoom level on both iPhone browser and desktop web browsers.
Fix the 'failed to ingest orders' error that occurs after uploading an Excel file on the Ingest Orders page. Ensure the upload and save operations complete successfully.
Optimize the speed of Excel file upload and order saving operations on the Ingest Orders page. Reduce processing time and improve responsiveness.
On the Master Designs page, display uploaded design mappings in a table underneath the upload area. Enable inline editing of the design code column for each row.

Add a Karigar dropdown in the Master Designs editing interface that shows the list of karigars extracted from the Master Design Excel file. Allow selection from this dropdown when editing design mappings.

Implement cascading updates so that when a design code is modified in the Master Designs page, all pending orders with that design code are automatically updated with the new mapping (generic name and karigar assignment).
Ensure all dashboard tabs (Total Orders, Ready, Hallmark, Customer Orders, Karigars) display the correct and up-to-date design mappings after design codes are modified in the Master Designs page.
Fix JPEG export functionality to work correctly on iPhone browsers. Ensure exported JPEG files download successfully and contain the expected order data.
Fix PDF export functionality to work correctly on iPhone browsers. Ensure exported PDF files download successfully and contain the expected order data with proper formatting.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix row selection highlighting across all tabs (excluding design column which shows popup)
Fix sidebar display on iPhone at 100% zoom and prevent overlap at 50% zoom
Fix ingest orders failure and optimize upload/save speed
Enable editing/modifying design code in master excel page with Karigar dropdown from Master Design list
Implement cascading updates to all pending orders when design code is modified
Ensure all dashboard tabs display correct mappings after design code updates
Fix JPEG and PDF export functionality on iPhone browser

projectName: Fix row selection, sidebar display, ingest errors, design editing, and export functionality
